name: Hygiene Kits
description: Distributes two different types of customized hygiene kits to their Receiving Site Partners. - Daily Essentials Kits: contains least 10 different everyday essentials such as shampoo, body wash, socks, and deodorant. - Rinse Free Necessities Kits: contains many of the same items such as socks and dental care but also includes items like shower free body wipes and SPF to ensure they are meeting the needs of neighbors who may not have regular shower access.
